question.title: RCP - Search option under Multichoice widget
question.body: I am using org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.opal.multichoice.MultiChoice in my application to work on multiple selections. However, I have nearly 70 multiple entries under the widget and it is difficult to search and select the required one. Is there any possibility of having a search box under the widget to make the selection process easy, or any existing widget that provides this kind of functionality?
